page.title: 02C.MINNAARS.
page.content:
{Minnaars}is a Dutch company who pack and sell{fruit}and{vegetables}all over the world.Its biggest branch is in{ {Earith}which is also the{head {office.}Minnaars sells fruit and vegetables country wide,to all the sales, markets and supermarkets.They get their supplies from{Spain,Italy, {E.E.C.,Holland}and{South America.} In Earith,there are 80 to 100 employees who work at Minnaars.They own 3 lorries and hire 20 to 30 lorries per day.They own several acres of land up to{Bluntisham}church.They came to Earith in{1968.}They came to position their premises near to eastern ports and not too far away from the markets. Earith is ideally situated.
(By Howard, Dominic and Andrew,aged 10 years.)
